definitions.title: n.m.
definitions.body: appar. (si vera l.) term. techn. for some beam in a house, perhaps rafter, or girder (NH id., Levy, Jastrow, but acc. to Hoffm:ZAW ii. 1881, 71 it is changed fr. oblong block of wood (O. T.) to a building-stone, or brick in Mish.);—only Hb Hab 2:11 for a stone out of the wall crieth out, [[מֵעֵץ יַעֲנֶנׇּה]] ´[[וְכ]] and a rafter out of the timber-work answereth it.
